header_text: In the middle of the night, you wake up abruptly and feel weird as you sit up. It's as if your mind isn't working correctly, and you start to think you might be losing control. This thought frightens you, and you decide to lie back down and just observe it.

elements.Text: Do you need to fight your strange feelings in order to make your anxiety go away?

elements.name: In the middle of the night, you wake up abruptly and feel weird as you sit up. It's as if your mind isn't working correctly, and you start to think you might be losing control.
